snippet: Atletico Madrid suffered a double blow that may affect their chances in next weekend's Champions League final when top scorer Diego Costa and playmaker Arda Turan limped out of Saturday's La Liga showdown at Barcelona....

headline.print_headline: Atletico's Costa Limps Out of La Liga Game at Barca
headline.main: Atletico's Costa Limps Out of La Liga Game at Barca

lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid suffered a double blow that may affect their chances in next weekend's Champions League final when top scorer Diego Costa and playmaker Arda Turan limped out of Saturday's La Liga showdown at Barcelona.
